title: C-Stop LHS | Academic Computing and Communications Center | University of Illinois at Chicago

For more information visit ACCC Service and Operations Status       C-Stop LHS      On the first floor of the Library of the Health Sciences is a C-Stop – a flexible space for:  Work – group space to collaborate with your classmates, or individual space to work independently  Print – black and white or color printing available with the new Wepa solution!  Recharge – charge your electronic device securely while on the go, just bring your charger and plug your device into a recharging station  Help – Talk with one of our knowledgeable consultants for help with Accounts/Passwords , the UIC Wireless Network , Personal Device Maintenance , WebStore software installations , or general questions about other ACCC services       Google Maps image     C-Stop LHS  Library of the Health Sciences   1750 W. Polk Street,  LHS 1st Floor,  Chicago,  IL        Hours   Hours - Service Hours     Sunday        Monday  09:00am – 07:00pm  In-person password change support 9 am - 5pm only      Tuesday  09:00am – 07:00pm  In-person password change support 9 am - 5pm only      Wednesday  09:00am – 07:00pm  In-person password change support 9 am - 5pm only      Thursday  09:00am – 07:00pm  In-person password change support 9 am - 5pm only      Friday  09:00am – 07:00pm  In-person password change support 9 am - 5pm only      Saturday               Support           Academic Continuity    Academic Multimedia Lab and Lightboard Studio    ARC Helpdesk    C-Stop BSB    C-Stop LHS    Daley Library Helpdesk    LTS Support Office
